CertificateName.default: Which certificate should be used at the Load Balancer for APIM?

Credentials.Description: WSO2 API Manager Admin Credentials. Please refer https://docs.wso2.com/display/AM210/Maintaining+Logins+and+passwords to change credentials.

KeyPairName.Description: The key pair to establish a SSH connection to the web servers. This should be already created.

CertificateName.Description: A previously uploaded certificate to use at the Load Balancer Listeners.

DBUsername.Description: The username to be used in the WSO2 AM DB.

DBPassword.Description: The password to be used in the WSO2 AM DB.
